name: I, a Witch, brought a malfunctioning broom to my Broom Driver License test and now everything is a mess and I wanna cry
name_original: I, a Witch, brought a malfunctioning broom to my Broom Driver License test and now everything is a mess and I wanna cry
description:
Beat all the levels to get your Broom Driver's License!

A D to rotate the broom.

Space to go forward at extreme S P E E D

Left CTRL to stop abruptly.

Tip: Do small boosts of speed, stop, and make small adjustements to your direction!
